title: Children of Destruction
description: What’s the last man on Earth supposed to do with 4 attractive women and a boy? What is so special about them? Why did they survive when everyone else was suddenly and mysteriously destroyed? What caused this catastrophe?The answers are revealed in a story of survival that spans over 200 years.From their adopted farm in Washington to inter-species conflicts among the stars, you’ll meet the most unusual family of survivors ever contrived by circumstance and necessity.Rated "R"
author: Al Philipson
